issue.title: [C++][CI] Set CTEST_PARALLEL_LEVEL to $concurrency
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8012](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8012). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently the default `test` target runs serially while `unittest` arbitrarily uses 4 threads. On many systems that's suboptimal. The environment variable `CTEST_PARALLEL_LEVEL` can be set to run tests in parallel, and we should probably have a good default for it (like the hardware concurrency)

https://cmake.org/cmake/help/latest/manual/ctest.1.html
